Articles.Content:
Recently having fun with the Kethane mod (putting a fuel refinery/depot in orbit of Minmus makes interplanetary exploration a lot easier).

I'm also branching out with the life support mods - but I'm wondering: is there a cross over: Life support machinery that will convert Kethane to O2 and/or water?

I did some Googling and searching here on the Forums, to no avail. I haven't seen any Kethane power life support yet.

Ideally, I'd love to be able to attach a solar power array (and/or nuclear thermoelectric cells), a CO2 scrubber, a hydroponics pod, and a Kethane convertor to a big Kethane tank for long term deep-space station life support.

Any ideas/suggestion?

Thanks,
